mapper.select: select th.history_id,th.provide_dep,th.his_name,th.his_detail, th.period,th.save_time ,th.creater ,pd.name ,pu.name as peoName,th.remark,am.par_name,tho.remark as tho_remark FROM t_history_data th LEFT JOIN pub_organ pd ON th.provide_dep = pd.code and pd.STATUS='1' LEFT JOIN t_history_operate tho ON th.history_id=tho.history_id LEFT JOIN t_parameter am ON am.par_code = 'T_HISTORY_OPERATE|OPERATE_RES' AND tho.operate_res = am.par_value LEFT JOIN pub_user pu on th.creater=pu.ID where th.history_id=#{h_provideDep}

select * from t_history_data where 1=1
AND provide_dep = #{provideDep}, AND his_name = #{hisName}, AND his_detail = #{hisDetail}, AND period = #{period}, AND save_time = #{saveTime}, AND creater = #{creater}, AND state = #{state}, AND remark = #{remark}

select count(h.history_id) from t_history_data h
LEFT JOIN (SELECT history_id,MAX(operate_time) AS operate_time FROM t_history_operate WHERE state = #{timeType} GROUP BY history_id) ope ON h.history_id = ope.history_id
where 1=1
AND h.provide_dep = #{provideDep}
AND h.state = #{state}
AND ope.operate_time >= CONCAT(#{stratDate},' 00:00:00')
AND ope.operate_time <= CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
AND ((h.state = '00' AND h.creater = #{userId}) OR h.state NOT IN ('00'))
AND h.state NOT IN ('00')
mapper.insert: insert into t_history_data ( history_id, provide_dep, his_name, his_detail, period, save_time, creater, state, remark ) values ( #{historyId}, #{provideDep}, #{hisName}, #{hisDetail}, #{period}, #{saveTime}, #{creater}, #{state}, #{remark} )
